description: This file defines a utility function 'classNames' which combines class name strings, arrays, and objects into a single space-separated string, commonly used for dynamically assigning CSS classes in a JavaScript/React project.

classes.name: default
classes.description: The default export, which is the 'classNames' function itself.

methods.name: classNames(...args)
methods.description: Composes truthy class names into a single string, handling string, array, and object inputs.
